description: The coach requests a side‑by‑side comparison of the defensive patterns of two rival soccer teams using recent match footage. The PlayMinder Coach ingests the videos, fetches player stats, analyzes defensive patterns, generates tactical recommendations, creates visual diagrams for each team, and returns a concise comparative report with visualizations.
